channel.title: Brutal-PK - Death is Brutal ( OFFICIAL )
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/HS7uXx8.png[/img]
[b]Hello Guest and welcome to Brutal-PK.[/b] We decided to close down Optimize OS and instead of make something actually professional and in time "Unique". Our server is based on PKing and the purpose of it is PKing and oldschool PKing only. The hybriding on it is very awesome compared to other oldschool servers! we are now here and we will stay here for good. Come and join the fun!
[b]Links:[/b] Webclient [ soon ] [url=http://www.brutal-pk.org/Brutal-PK.jar]Client download[/url] [url=http://www.brutal-pk.org]Forums[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3BOoTnUDFI&feature=youtu.be]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3BOoTnUDFI&feature=youtu.be[/url]
[b]Content[/b] -Clean server -Clean Combat -Hybriding -PvMing(Pictures Below) -Custom 464 Maps
[b]Media:[/b]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/377ll.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2rhaih0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/30rte1f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2cnce2d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/fx5xyt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/303d6xg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/fnxq35.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/243nk7n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1zf4vwk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/ipnk3a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/21oadk.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/28br2te.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2luf794.png[/img][/CENTER]
